Title: Breakfast of Champions
Writer: Brett Johnson, Ann Biderman (created by), Gina Welch (staff writer), Lenore Zion (staff writer)
Actors: Liev Schreiber, Paula Malcomson, Eddie Marsan, Dash Mihok
Plot: As Ray becomes more involved with the Finney family, Terry adjusts to life outside. Connor and Bridget adjust to life without Abby.
